title: Hello!
text:
I am a freelance web developer with 10 years of experience building web applications in technologies such as Javascript, React, Java, Spring boot and more. 
 When I'm not playing overwatch I love to spend time building my own games. I am currently working on a very ambitious coop rpg based on beautiful swedish nature and cute nordic animals.

title: Tele2
text: At Tele2 I am building some secret stuff. but it is alot of cool tech. like GraphQL, Typscript and Redux Sagas.

title: Comhem
text: As a consultant at comhem I was part of a team focused on optimizing the purchase flows and increasing profits based on A/B tests and analytics.

title: Pendulum
text:
Pendulum is one of my earliest game ideas. It's built around the idea that with one simple interaction it is possible to create very complex movement.
I still feel there is more to explore with this game and I will definitely revisit the game for further development.

title: Aftonbladet
text: I worked at aftonbladet between 2014 and 2019 mainly rebuilding the site in React.

title: Spaghetti
text:
Spaghetti is a clipboard history manager that I built because I couldn't find one i liked.
 It is very simple but effective tool that I use all the time.

title: Thrusters
text: Thrusters is a game where you control a small rocket and try not to crash. It has been said it is really hard.

title: Stockholm University
text: I worked at Stockholm University between 2011 and 2014 maintaining many different services and systems. I mostly worked in Java, Spring, and Grails/Groovy

title: Notelify
text:
Notelify is a note taking app that i put together because i wanted a place where I could put down notes fast and just scroll to older notes.
 It has a tagging system, but it's mostly made to be an infinite feed of notes. Initially I intended for it to have a fast search function, but I never got around to implementing that. 
 there is however no e2e encryption so i wouldn't recommend using the app for sensitive things.

title: Blokkii
text: Blokkii is a casual puzzle game with some nice music. it can be a bit tricky but you'll get there. (be patient with the loading... it can take a while)

title: enqvist.io
text: Well this is very meta, but yes. i actually built this site using react
